article_title: Editorial: Does charity care require COPN?
article_text:
Thank you for reading 14 free articles on our site. og.description: A Virginia panel is considering whether to do something many other states already have, and the commonwealth should: repeal the certificate of public need system. But as a recent Times-Dispatch front page story noted, the possibility of repeal raises a concern about the future of charity care.
